articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.title: The Hulu + Live TV bundle will cost at least $5 more starting in December
articles.description: Like many other streaming services over the past year, Hulu raised its subscription prices in October from $7 to $8 per month for its ad-supported tier. Now, the Disney-owned streaming service is also raising the prices for its Hulu + Live TV bundle. In an em…
articles.content: Like many other streaming services over the past year, Hulu raised its subscription prices in October from $7 to $8 per month for its ad-supported tier. Now, the Disney-owned streaming service is als… [+1234 chars]

articles.title: Causeway to Enola Holmes 2: the seven best films to watch on TV this week
